system.requirements: Tier 2: Forbidden Lore (Daemonology), Willpower 40. Aptitudes: Offence, Willpower
system.effect: Character can re-roll failed Awareness and Psyniscience tests to detect the presence of Daemons. Additionaly their attacks against Daemons gain the Proven (3) Quality.

description.value: Character can re-roll failed Awareness and Psyniscience tests to detect the presence of Daemons. Additionaly their attacks against Daemons gain the Proven (3) Quality.
